thread.title: JANOVICK/JANET MARILYN
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by JANOVICK/JANET MARILYN

author: JANOVICK/JANET MARILYN
title: JANOVICK/JANET MARILYN
text: My ASAP representative was communicated very clearly what he was able to do and followed through with everything. He was able to find a cheaper flight than I had found on any other website. I had a problem with another website, misspelling my travel companion's name - with ASAP, the representative sent me an electronic form to fill in & walked me through it, minimizing chances for error. I would certainly use them again.
